name: Obviously Snake
description:
WASD to move, or press Arrows
You can technically eat yourself if you turn try to U-turn too fast.

It's Snake, the classic game, you might've played it on your phone if you're older than 20 years old cause there were phones that had that. Eat the fruit for 10 points, eat the frog running for its life for 20 points.

Consume until nothing remains.
